definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: beast, animal, cattle (Ar. bahiymah;un)—´[[בּ]] Ge 1:24 + 137 t.; cstr. [[בֶּהֱמַת]] Nu 3:41, Nu 3:41 + 10 t.; sf. [[בְּהֶמְתְּךָ]] Le 19:19 + 4 t.; [[בְּהֶמְתֶָּךָ]] Ex 20:10 + 4 t.; [[בְּהֶמְתּוֹ]] Ge 36:6, Pr 12:10; pl. abs. [[בְּהֵמוֹת]] De 32:24 + 6 t. + Ps 73:22 (v. infr.); cstr. [[בַּהֲמוֹת]] Ps 8:8 + 5 t.;—beast, & coll. beasts (Ge 8:1 + very oft.)

of living creatures other than man ([[אָדָם]]) Ge 8:1, Ex 8:13, Ex 8:14, Ex 9:9, Ex 9:10, Ex 9:22, Ex 22:18, Le 18:23, Le 18:23 (where ´[[בּ]] is male, so Le 20:16) De 27:21, Ps 36:7 etc.; ´[[מֵאָדָם וְעַד בּ]] (´[[בּ]] including all the larger animals) Ex 9:25, Ex 12:12, Ps 135:8, Je 50:3 etc.; as inferior to man Job 18:3, Ps 49:13, Ps 49:20, so also Ec 3:18, Ec 3:19, Ec 3:19, Ec 3:21; opp. also birds & reptiles Ge 6:7, Ge 7:23, Ge 8:17 cf. Ez Eze 44:31 etc.; also to fishes 1Ki 5:13, Job 12:7 cf. v:Job 12:8, Ps 8:9, Zep 1:3.

opp. also to wild beasts [[חַיַּת הָאָרֶץ]], [[הַשָּׂדֶה]] ´[[ח]] Ge 1:24, Ge 1:25, Ge 1:26, Ge 2:20, Ge 3:14, Ge 7:14, Ge 7:21, Ge 9:10, Ps 50:10, Ps 148:10, Is 46:1 etc.; esp. therefore cattle, as owned and used by man, Ge 47:18 (´[[מִקְנֵה הַבּ]]) Ex 20:10 = De 5:14, Le 19:19, Le 26:22, Nu 3:41, Nu 3:41, Nu 3:45, Nu 3:45, De 2:35, De 11:15, Jon 4:11, Zec 2:8, Zec 8:10, Zec 14:15, Ezr 1:4, Ezr 1:6, Ne 9:37, Ne 10:37 etc.; in one (late) passage of animal for riding (horse ? mule ?) Ne 2:12, Ne 2:12, Ne 2:14.
